info.title: Housing Domain
info.description: The Housing Domain deals with data related to the housing of employees of the employment agency. These are the residences the agency can use to house their employees.

schema.description: Please refer to the [JSON Patch](https://jsonpatch.com/) documentation for more details.

id.description: The Plan4Flex primary key Id of the database entity

roomId.description: The id of the room in which the bed planning is made.

bedId.description: The key Id of the bed for which the bed planning is made.

bedIndex.description: The index of the bed in the room. Note that this is not the bed id, but the index of the bed in the room.

employeeAvailabilityId.description: The id of the employee availability for which the bed planning is made.

startDate.description: The (inclusive) start date of the bed planning.

endDate.description: The (inclusive) end date of the bed planning.

approved.description: Whether the bed planning is approved by the employment agency.

id.description: The internal identifier of Plan4Flex for this object.

capacity.description: The number of people able to sleep in this bed

id.description: The internal identifier of Plan4Flex for this object.

name.description: The description of what the category entails.

Category.description: The kind of home a place of residence is.

id.description: The internal identifier of Plan4Flex for this object.

contractTypeId.description: The internal identifier of a specific contract type.

created.description: Creation date of the contract, automatically set when created.

startOfRental.description: The date of the start of the rent period

endOfRental.description: The nullable date of the end of the rent period. When the contract is indefinite, this is null.

noticePeriodInMonths.description: The notice period of an contract in months

deposit.description: The amount of deposit for the contract

returnedDeposit.description: The amount of deposit returned for the contract

returnedDepositDate.description: The date when te deposit was returned

Contract.description: An object that contains data regarding the contract for housing.

errors.description: Errors that occurred during the request

trace.description: The trace id of the request, we can use this to trace the request through the system

ErrorResponse.description: The standard error response for the API

id.description: The Plan4Flex primary key Id of the database entity

streetName.description: The optional name of the street of the address

houseNumber.description: The optional house number of the address

houseNumberSuffix.description: An optional suffix to the house number

postalCode.description: The optional postal code of the address

city.description: The optional town or city of the address

phoneNumber.description: The optional phone number of the address

countryId.description: The optional id of a Data.Address.Grpc.Interface.Dto.Country object

mobilePhoneNumber.description: The optional mobile phone number of the address

emailAddress.description: The optional email address of the address

faxNumber.description: The optional fax number of the address

latitude.description:
The optional Geo code Latitude coordinate of the address
Only provided when GeocodeStatus = 'Updated' or 'CoordinatesDontMatchAddress' 
otherwise null

longitude.description:
The optional Geo code Longitude coordinate of the address
Only provided when GeocodeStatus = 'Updated' or 'CoordinatesDontMatchAddress' 
otherwise null

geocodeStatus.description: The optional Geo code status of the Lat-Long values of the address

Housing.Address.description: An address contains the information about a location, and how to contact the person at that location.

id.description: The P4F ID of the availability

housingId.description: The housing ID of the availability

ouId.description: The id of the OU for this availability

from.description: The inclusive start date of the availability

until.description: The nullable inclusive end date of the availability. If null, the availability is indefinite.

HousingAvailability.description: An object that holds data regarding an availability of a housing.

textField1.description: An optional textfield to insert extra text which does not belong to another field.

textField2.description: An optional textfield to insert extra text which does not belong to another field.

textField3.description: An optional textfield to insert extra text which does not belong to another field.

textField4.description: An optional textfield to insert extra text which does not belong to another field.

textField5.description: An optional textfield to insert extra text which does not belong to another field.

textField6.description: An optional textfield to insert extra text which does not belong to another field.

textField7.description: An optional textfield to insert extra text which does not belong to another field.

textField8.description: An optional textfield to insert extra text which does not belong to another field.

textField9.description: An optional textfield to insert extra text which does not belong to another field.

textField10.description: An optional textfield to insert extra text which does not belong to another field.

HousingExtraFields.description: Additional string data for a housing.

id.description: The internal identifier of Plan4Flex for this object.

ownerId.description: An optional owner identifier of the housing.

nationalityId.description: An optional nationality of the housing.

comment.description: An optional note for the housing.

advance.description: The amount paid in advance for the housing.

afwijkendpercentage.description: Whether or not the rental fee is temporarily changed by a percentage.

percentage.description: The temporary change of rental fees as a percentage.

floor.description: An optional description of the floor level.

copyOfId.description: If this place of residence is a copy of another place of residence, this identifier refers to it.

addInNightRegister.description: Whether or not a night registration needs to be registered at the municipality. See also here.

pickupAddressId.description: The identifier of the address where the inhabitants of the housing need to be picked up at.

accountManagerId.description: The identifier of the account manager.

addressId.description: The identifier of the address of the housing.

id.description: The internal identifier of Plan4Flex for this object.

name.description: The name of the owner of the housing.

address.description: The address of the owner of the housing.

postalCode.description: The postal code of the owner of the housing.

city.description: The town of the owner of the housing.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the owner of the housing.

mobileNumber.description: The mobile phone number of the owner of the housing.

email.description: The email address of the owner of the housing.

fax.description: The fax number of the owner of the housing.

Owner.description: An object that holds data regarding an owner of a housing.

total.description: The total amount of items that can be paginated over.
The total amount of items that can be paginated over.
The total amount of items that can be paginated over.

id.description: The internal identifier of Plan4Flex for this object.

startDate.description: The start date for the housing registration.

endDate.description: The end date for the housing registration. Can be left empty

name.description: The name for the housing registration

description.description: The optional description for the housing registration

comment.description: The optional comment for the housing registration

rooms.description:
An optional list of unique room IDs. Every ID must refer to a room that exists under the same house.
If no room IDs are provided, the housing registration will count for the entire house.

deviatingWeekAmount.description: An optional amount to override the calculated amount, so long as it is lower than the calculated amount.

id.description: The internal identifier of Plan4Flex for this object.

housingId.description: The housing the room belongs to

Room.description: A room within a place of residence.

id.description: The internal identifier of Plan4Flex for this object.

roomId.description: The room the bed is in.

bedTypeId.description: An identifier to the kind of bed this is.

availableFrom.description: The inclusive date when the bed started being available.

availableUntil.description: The inclusive date when the bed is no longer available.

RoomBed.description: A bed within a room within a place of residence.

id.description: The internal identifier of Plan4Flex for this object.

provincie.description: The province within The Netherlands where the SNF registration has taken place.

type.description: Values A-F, the type of living space.

gebruiksOppervlakte.description: The usable space according to GBO.

aantalPitten.description: The number of hob burners available.

regioOnderneming.description: The region in The Netherlands of the organisation.

toelichtingOnderneming.description: An optional explanation of the company.

gemeente.description: The municipality in The Netherlands where the housing is in.

SnfData.description: Data for the Stichting Normering Flexwonen regarding a specific place of residence.

id.description: The internal identifier of Plan4Flex for this object.

Bearer.description: The authorization header. This should be passed with value "bearer <token>". The token can be obtained through the Users Domain. See also the Getting Started page.
